page.title: 12SWALCLIFFE GRANGE
page.content: THE TAYLOR'S LIVE HERE,2 ADULTS & 3 CHILDREN.IT IS A MIXED FARM,ARABLE, SHEEP AND BEEF,GROWING BARLEY,WHEAT, RAPE, OATS,FEED,BEANS & GRASS WITH 139 HEREFORD & FRIESIAN BEEF CATTLE,426 MUALE SHEEP,2 SOWS & 14 PIGLETS. THEY ALSO HAVE 1 DOG,4 PET SHEEP,1 DONKEY,A FEW CHICKENS & 2 CATS.IF THEY GO TO MARKET, IT'S AT BANBURY AND THEY ALSO SHOP THERE.THEY FARM 720 ACRES,220 ARE RENTED FROM OTHER PEOPLE. THEY MAINLY PLAY TENNIS, WATCH TELEVISION OR GO TO FRIENDS'HOUSES FOR ENTERTAINMENT.THEY ARE CHURCH OF ENGLAND DENOMINATION.THE OLD HOUSE USED TO BE A COACHING INN AND SOME PARTS OF THE HOUSE ARE 300 YEARS OLD.THE TAYLOR FAMILY HAS BEEN AT SWALCLIFFE GRANGE FOR 90 YEARS;THIS IS THE 3RD GENERATION.MOST HEDGES HAVE BEEN UPROOTED AND THEIR FIELDS LOOK LIKE PRAIRIES. 350 TREES HAVE BEEN PLANTED ON OTHER PARTS OF THE FARM.
